dcterms:subject: Rent
sugawara:personRoleA: Tursun Akhund walad-i Mulla Qurban Akhund
schema:abstract: Tusun(sic) Akhund b. Mulla Qurban Akhund states that he leases his ikki etiz? sekkiz chareklik bidezarliq land at Eski Kol of Dolatbagh to Ismail Akhun for 170 charek of bughday in terms of two years; the first year 90 charek and the second year 80 charek.
schema:grant: <KAKENHI> 研究費 (Japan Society for the Promotion of Science)
